## Introduction

For my final project I am working on using MLB data from the baseballr package and a baseball reference data set looking at first round draft picks.


```{r}
# Installing the package
install.packages("baseballr")
```

```{r}
library(baseballr)
code_barrel(df)
d <- retrosheet_data(years_to_acquire = 2020:2022)
fg_id <- id$fangraphs_id

fg_data_trout <-
  fg_batter_game_logs(playerid = fg_id, year = 2022)
```

# Draft Data

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(broom)
library(readxl)
my_data <- read_excel("ds334_final_project/Final-Data.xlsx", sheet = 2, col_names = TRUE)
```
